A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All of these negative reviews are nonsense - this is a great movie. The best Star Wars movie since Empire. It’s definitely a huge improvement over Force Awakens. I’m a huge Star Wars fan. I’ve watched all of the movies\, read the majority of the canon book/comics and some of the legends stuff\, and played some of the video games. It was super entertaining\, funny at times\, engaging\, etc. if you’re a true fan\, chances are you’ll love this movie. I’m going to see it a few more times at least.
